user_query: I'm a music enthusiast who wants to explore new tracks. Please search for the track 'Love Yourself' and recommend 4 similar songs. Also, provide me with the information about the artist of the original track.

TaskList.description: Search for the track 'Love Yourself' to retrieve its details including the artist information.
Get artist information from the result of Subtask 1.
Find 4 songs that are similar to 'Love Yourself' based on genre and style.
